jadc2.name: Joint ISR Operations
jadc2.description: Intelligence, Surveillance, and Reconnaissance (ISR) operations to provide situational awareness.
steps: Tasking: Define collection requirements based on commander's intent.
Collection: Acquire raw data from multi-domain sensors.
Processing: Convert raw data into usable information for analysis.

cyber.name: Active Scanning
cyber.description: Scanning for vulnerabilities and open ports to map the attack surface.

hfo.name: Omphalos
hfo.description: The central perception hub for gesture and kinetic sensing.
hfo.mantra: Given a stream of landmarks, When the hand closes, Then the Omphalos triggers a grab event.

jadc2.name: Joint Intelligence Fusion
jadc2.description: Integrating and analyzing information from all sources to produce intelligence.
steps: Integration: Combine data from disparate sources into a common format.
Evaluation: Assess the reliability and accuracy of the fused data.
Analysis: Identify patterns and trends to support decision-making.

cyber.name: Acquire Infrastructure
cyber.description: Acquiring domains, servers, and other infrastructure to support operations.

hfo.name: Bifrost
hfo.description: The bridge between heterogeneous data streams and the HFO core.
hfo.mantra: Given a raw payload, When it crosses the Bifrost, Then it is wrapped in a Zod-validated envelope.

jadc2.name: Joint Maneuver Operations
jadc2.description: The movement of forces to achieve a position of advantage over the enemy.
steps: Positioning: Move assets to optimal locations for engagement.
Transformation: Adapt force posture based on environmental changes.
Synchronization: Coordinate movements across domains to maximize impact.

cyber.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
cyber.description: Executing commands and scripts to interact with the target system.

hfo.name: Abyssal Flow
hfo.description: The deterministic physics engine for shaping virtual and physical interactions.
hfo.mantra: Given a set of forces, When the Mirror Magus shapes the flow, Then the simulation remains deterministic.

jadc2.name: Joint Fire Support
jadc2.description: The coordination and integration of fires to achieve desired effects.
steps: Targeting: Identify and prioritize targets for engagement.
Delivery: Deploy kinetic or non-kinetic effects to the target.
Assessment: Evaluate the impact of the delivered effects.

cyber.name: Exfiltration Over C2 Channel
cyber.description: Exfiltrating data through the established command and control channel.

hfo.name: Spores
hfo.description: The stigmergic delivery system for cascading updates and messages.
hfo.mantra: Given a message, When the Spore Storm releases it, Then it propagates through the NATS mesh.

jadc2.name: Joint Information Operations
jadc2.description: The integrated employment of information-related capabilities to influence or disrupt.
steps: Deception: Mislead the adversary regarding friendly intentions.
Disruption: Degrade the adversary's ability to communicate or decide.
Exploitation: Leverage adversary vulnerabilities for strategic gain.

cyber.name: Data Manipulation
cyber.description: Manipulating data to disrupt operations or mislead users.

hfo.name: Grudges
hfo.description: The architectural enforcement layer that disrupts non-compliant code.
hfo.mantra: Given a violation, When the Red Regnant screams, Then the violation is logged to the Blackboard.

jadc2.name: Joint Force Protection
jadc2.description: Measures taken to protect the force and its assets from threats.
steps: Hardening: Strengthen assets against potential attacks.
Detection: Identify incoming threats in real-time.
Response: Deploy defensive measures to neutralize threats.

cyber.name: Impair Defenses
cyber.description: Disabling or bypassing security controls to facilitate further actions.

hfo.name: Agni
hfo.description: The blue flame of immunization that protects the HFO cleanroom.
hfo.mantra: Given a threat, When the Pyre Praetorian dances, Then the cleanroom remains untainted.

jadc2.name: Joint Logistics
jadc2.description: The planning and execution of the movement and support of forces.
steps: Sustainment: Ensure the continuous supply of resources.
Storage: Securely manage and index data and assets.
Retrieval: Provide rapid access to stored information for operations.

cyber.name: Data from Local System
cyber.description: Collecting data from the local system to support intelligence gathering.

hfo.name: The Ledger
hfo.description: The forensic datalake for storing and querying HFO history.
hfo.mantra: Given an artifact, When the Kraken Keeper assimilates it, Then it is indexed in the DuckDB lake.

jadc2.name: Joint Command and Control
jadc2.description: The exercise of authority and direction by a commander over assigned forces.
steps: Planning: Develop courses of action to achieve mission objectives.
Decision: Select the optimal course of action based on intelligence.
Direction: Issue orders to subordinate units to execute the plan.

cyber.name: Application Layer Protocol
cyber.description: Using application layer protocols to communicate with the command and control server.

hfo.name: Firmament
hfo.description: The strategic navigation layer for orchestrating the HFO swarm.
hfo.mantra: Given a goal, When the Spider Sovereign decides, Then the swarm navigates the Firmament.
